name: Shipwreck Series Bald Eagle II
additionalNotes:
https://privadacigarclub.com/product/shipwreck-series-bald-eagle-ii-by-corolla-beach-idiots-cigar-club/

"Corolla Beach Idiots Cigar Club: The Outer Banks’ first cigar club

On December 17, 2021 the Bald Eagle II a shrimping vessel had some mechanical issues off the coast of the Outer Banks of North Carolina and ran aground. The Outer Banks is known as the Grave Yard of the Atlantic with over 1000 wrecks off the coast.

So to honor the men of these vessels the Corolla Beach Idiots Cigar Club and Privada Cigar Club has released #1 in the Shipwreck Series. The 5×58 Box Pressed Maduro is the first in this series and will be a quick favorite. Chocolate, coffee, and earthy notes make this cigar a great smoke. Don’t miss out on this great cigar and when purchasing the only regret you will have is that you didn’t buy more! Like always these will sell out fast!"
